body: Shout out to dudeydude whos complaining about underage lolis when one of his favorites is a doujin of an underage naruto character
these people coming from twitter only cause problems
Laughing at nintendrones who come here to cry. Get a life, losers.

Lol, a lot of artists on Nintendo games have drawn hentai and loli and whatnot.

A lot of artists actually get there starts drawing this kind of stuff.

insert obligatory "why does Resplendent Lucina look like a child" comment here. But seriously, the fact that Nintendo hired this artist again is pretty disgusting. The art style is good but it's repulsive how the artist literally downsized her to look like a child. Oh, and to the absolute smooth brain below me, go back to jerking off to lolicon hentai instead of making a poor argument like "oh but there's other young characters in the game, why aren't you talking about them?" The artists for other younger characters in the game don't also 1. throw a character's canon appearance out the window to make the character look like a child when they normally don't look like one and 2. draw child porn. Twitter has a problem with the fact Nintendo re-hired an artist that literally draws child porn to draw Lucina, only for the finished art to literally make her look like a child, which in turn makes people think Resplendent Lucina's art is pedobait. Oh, and this comic sucks too.
Bruh man really crying about Lucina when your game has lolis in it made in japan where its not seen as a problem you're just some dumb ass loser man hate twitter people
Yeah, I created an account just to tell you how fucking pathetic you are. You got a problem with that?
Yo FalconKick, have you ever thought about having sex?

Not only is this comic a disgusting degenerate mess, but you had the audacity to draw Resplendent Lucina as a fucking 12 year old, I hope your parents are happy knowing that your are a pedophile who would rather look at a child's body instead of a grown woman's.
